page.title: 05NEW HARTLEY : SHOPS.
page.content: {THE POST OFFICE} The Post Office in New Hartley is open almost every day. The owners like living here, the shop is of average size and they get quite a lot of customers. The shop does not need any improvements, but it would be better if the{Paper Hut}was with the rest of the shops. { {THE CHIP SHOP } New Hartley Chip Shop has been open for{10 years,}on a Thursday, Friday and Saturday dinnertimes. They get quite a lot of customers, both regular and irregular. The owner likes living in New Hartley but would like improvements made to make his shop smaller.
